Crypto Market Sim is a Cryptocurrency trading simulator, allowing you to practice your trading strategies risk free.

Honest Cryptocurrency Since 1896

Professional coin investors can use this app to test new trading strategies.

Main Features:

  • Virtual Trading of hundreds of cryptocurrencies
  • Real Time Coin Prices
  • Charts of hourly price data
